Class ContentDocumentLinkSelector

public inherited sharing class ContentDocumentLinkSelector

Description: Runs queries on the ContentDocumentLink object References:

Changes

07/02/2022 Initial version. 10/21/2023 getLatestPublishedContentVersion(): gets the last ContentVersion data associated with the record. 11/12/2023 getDocumentLinkByContentVersionId(): gets the document link related to the record and the last ContentVersion data.
